Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central. What is your next move, given the target location for your next move?  
choose:  
A. I rise.  
B. I rotate the camera downward.  
C. I fly forward.  
D. I turn left.  
E. I turn right.  
F. I rotate the camera upward.  
G. I descend.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: To navigate to the stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central, the agent needs to turn right from the current position, as the cafe is likely located along the right side of the road based on the given frames. Turning right will align the agent's path with the direction of the cafe.
